pages.text: $(li)The Ascus Bomb can be thrown generating a red area.$(br)$(li)All creatures inside of that area will receive the $(l:patchouli:potions/infernal_expansion/infection)Infection$(/l) effect damaging it and infecting the rest of the creatures near this one.$(br)$(li)It can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/infernal_expansion/infection)Potion of Infection$(/l) too.
